snippet: An infusion of new blood could alter the complexion of the Senate, increasing the sorts of conflicts among moderate and conservative Republicans that have reshaped the House.
abstract: Political Memo: Tea Party is very much alive in the drive for Republican control of the Senate, as evidenced by Ted Cruz's easy GOP primary victory in Texas, portending a potential shake-up in the mind-set of the chamber; infusion of new blood could alter the complexion of the Senate, increasing the sorts of conflicts among moderate and conservative Republicans that have reshaped the House.
lead_paragraph: An infusion of new blood could alter the complexion of the Senate, increasing the sorts of conflicts among moderate and conservative Republicans that have reshaped the House.

headline.seo: Tea Party Influence Could Reshape Senate Republicans
headline.main: Tea Party Aims to Apply Its Touch to the Senate G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Tea Party Trains Its Influence On Reshaping Senate G.O.P.
